vulnerability_findings.name: shadowing-builtin
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code:
Message memory msg = Message({
            Sender: _adr,
            Time: now,
            Val: _val,
            Data: _data
vulnerability_findings.message: Log.AddMessage.msg (local variable @ patch_14.sol#45-50) shadows built-in symbol "msg"
